metaDescription: Learn how Coach AI protects your data

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: Personio Foundation collects personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws and only for legitimate, clearly defined purposes. Collected data may include, but is not limited to, name, email address, IP address, usage data, and other information necessary to provide and improve our services. Data is collected transparently, purposefully, and with appropriate technical and organizational safeguards in place.

topics.title: Account Information
topics.description: Name, e-mail, phone number, preferred language
purposes: Displaying welcome message after logging in
Set language for UI and AI

topics.title: AI Personalization
topics.description: Current role, primary goals, confidence levels
purposes: Context for AI systems to generate personalized scenarios

topics.title: Voice Recordings
purposes: Allows users to review past training sessions by listening to the audio recording
Can optionally be shared with admins when submitting a review
This is the only data that is processed in the US
Aside from CoachAI-internal storage, audio data is also stored by OpenAI for a limited time for abuse detection and similar operational needs
storage: Retained for 90 days if consent is given

topics.title: Usage Metrics
topics.description: Total number of sessions, total training time, average score, current login streak
purposes: Provide app usage metrics as a whole for administrators
storage: Collected at various points as the user interacts with the app

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: Data is encrypted both in-transit and at-rest for maximum security

accountDeletion.title: Account Deletion
accountDeletion.description: Delete your account and all related data permanently

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.description: Export all data we have stored about you from the settings page
